title: Limit unread counters, badges, and notifications in open non token gated communities for non-members

milestone.description:
## OOBE (out of the box experience) 

- Restart OOBE development

- Work with design to scope and prioritise the OOBE development to be done during this cycle

 

## Messaging & Communities

*Priorities In priority order:*

**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 1.27 cycle**

**2. Fix bugs, both functional and UX fit-and-finish defects.**  

- Aim to finish fixing all issues tagged with "E:Design Feedback 1.25" and "E:Design Feedback 1.25".  This is because the 'Mobile UI fit and finish" co-working event will happen right after the 1.28 release, and to get maximum value from this event it would be great if all currently identified UI defects were closed before hand.

- Use https://status.app/insights/epics/E:Design%20Feedback%201.25 and https://status.app/insights/epics/E:Design%20Feedback%201.24 to get view all of these UI defect issues, and how we are tracking on closing them.

- Focus on bugs related Status Desktop interop with ad-hoc group chat functionality and Communities functionality, and specifically any bugs related to Status Community individual channel token gating.  

- Any other bugs and quality defects.

**DON'T BUILD NEW COMMUNITIES OR MESSANGING FUNCTIONALITY, FOCUS IN ON FIXING BUGS AND COMPLETING LOOSE ENDS RELATED TO FUNCTIONALITY THAT'S ALREADY BEEN BUILT BUT IS NOT QUITE COMPLETE**  

 

## Wallet

**1. Continue building out Mobile Wallet MVP main screens**

- By 'main screens', referring to all flows and screens in the Wallet section, excluding Wallet settings screens

body:
# Feature Issue

Presently, users encounter unread counters, badges, or notifications from open, non-token gated communities even prior to joining said communities.

### User Story

As a user engaging with communities, I desire an automatic system for managing notifications according to my community membership. This way, I won't receive unread counters, badges, or notifications from open, non-token gated communities until I become a member (join such community).

### Description

You can find a related discussion [here](https://discord.com/channels/624634427930312714/842696205213368331/1197851976717848587)

### Acceptance Criteria

1. **Given** I am not a member of an open non token-gated community,
**When** the community is in Pending or Open status,
**Then** :
- I should not receive any notifications related to that community, including push notifications and notifications in the Activity Center.
- I should not see any unread badges or counters for messages within that community.
- I still should be able to see all the message history in community channels in view-only (spectacular) mode. 

2. **Given**  I become a member of an open non token-gated community,
**When** the community status changes to Joined,
**Then:** 
- I should automatically start receiving all notifications related to that community, including push notifications and notifications in the Activity Center
- I should automatically see unread badges or counters for new messages within that community.
